TITLE: Lesson
DEF: Structured instructional units that cover a specific topic or skill, delivered in one contiguous time slot
TASK: The Lessons pattern offers structured instructional units that tackle a specific topic or skill. It facilitates learning by compartmentalizing complex concepts. Enhance LESSN by planning clear objectives, incorporating a variety of instructional strategies, and deploying formative assessments to track and adjust instruction as needed. AI can support this by providing diverse resources and instant feedback.
